    - Do not use fumigant sprays; they can be toxic if inhaled or absorbed through the skin.

   Over-the-counter Medications 
   
Many head lice medications are available ""over-the-counter"" without a prescription at a local drug store or pharmacy. Each over-the-counter product approved by the FDA for the treatment of head lice contains one of the following active
